name: Replics 2: Forget the Moon
summary:
This 3D Action adventure is the second part of the Replics Trilogie. 
 
You are on a moon basis, to which you were brought on March 16th 2067 as prisoners No. 02264 on instruction of Morg the ruler of Cenobita. 
Make on the way over for your prison escaped and Morg the account to pull itself. 
Fly with a shuttle to Lar II. 
Here you must cross among other things the Hypofarm, which Moon club and the library of the Cenobiten an attendance render and many other adventures exist. 
On its way (flight) after Cenobita you (inevitably) will make a excursion on Rakos over from there..... 
but you experience stop it!!!
